apps.title: iFinance 5
apps.description: iFinance helps you keep track of your income and spending in the most convenient and fastest way. iFinance's convenient evaluations and charts provide an at-a-glance overview of your income streams and expenditures so that optimizing your finances becomes a breeze. The app's automatic category assignment, tags, budgets, and analytics tools help turn your account history into much more than just a list of bare numbers. Want to find out how your assets are performing? Or why you keep maxing out your bank account each month, leaving you to wonder where your salary actually goes? Is it current expenses such as rent, insurance, food or loans? iFinance has all the answers. It can analyze your finances and helps you identify your biggest spending items and any categories with saving potential. iFinance 5 – Highlights: – Retrieve your account transactions – now available for banks in the US, Canada, and several European countries (requires a paid subscription) – Encrypted database – Password protection – Categories (including automatic assignment) – Contacts (including contacts' bank details) – Analyze expenses, income, losses, and profits – Charts (2D & 3D) – Reports – Budgets – iCloud and WiFi sync – Reconcile transactions – Handle different currencies in one database – VoiceOver support – Supported file import formats: CSV, OFX, QIF, MT940 – Multiple databases – Retrieve stock prices – Add file attachments to specific transactions Charts, Reports, Budgets, and Budgets Analysis iFinance offers a broad range of easy-to-customize charts and reports. Review your financial goals using the app's actionable budgets. How much money is there left for you to spend today or this month without stretching your budget? How much more do you need to earn in order to hit your monthly income target? Comprehensive Search Options Want to look up how much you paid for your TV four years ago, and find the corresponding invoice? If this type of task requires you to get up and browse through folders or boxes full of paperwork, you'll love iFinance's integrated search tool. Want to confirm whether the standing order for your rent payment was executed two months ago? Use iFinance 5 to find out in the bat of an eye! App Bundle for Mac, iPhone, and iPad iFinance 5 is available for Mac, iPad, and iPhone. When you buy the Mac version, you automatically get the iOS and iPadOS versions with your purchase – and vice versa. Please note: iFinance 5 is no longer available for Apple Watch. NEW IN IFINANCE 5 • Completely redesigned user interface now supporting dark mode • Account retrieval now also available for banks in the US and Canada (requires a paid subscription) • Annual budgets for year-round financial planning • Improved stock and portfolio management • Specify a custom storage location for databases and backups • Improved iCloud sync • You can now create rules for category assignment Terms of Use: https://syniumsoftware.com/terms

apps.title: Betterment Invest & Save Money
apps.description: Invest and save better with Betterment. Investing apps are a dime a dozen, right? So, you might be wondering why you should download this investing app. It’s simple: Betterment is a robo advisor built with technology that optimizes for you, creating a tailored experience that fits your needs whether you’re an investor-in-training or a stock market guru. Join the 1M+ people who entrust us with over $63+ billion. As an independent digital investment advisor and fiduciary, Betterment is built to help you do what’s best for your money so you can live better. With no minimum balance, you can get started with just $10 in minutes. Keep track of your financial life across your short- and long-term savings goals with our easy-to-use app. NEW CUSTOMERS EARN 4.40% VARIABLE APY* (as of 9/23/25) ON CASH - Get an extra 0.65% APY* with qualifying deposit—11x** the national average. - Protect your earnings with up to $2 million in FDIC insurance at our program banks, subject to certain conditions. Betterment is not a bank. - See program banks at www.betterment.com/cash-portfolio EXPERT-BUILT PORTFOLIOS TO HELP YOU WEATHER THE MARKET - Customize your stock-and-bond risk level with recommendations from the pros. - Choose one of our optimized, curated portfolios of ETFs, like Innovative Tech, Goldman Sachs Smart Beta, or socially responsible investing options: Broad, Social, or Climate Impact portfolios - Looking for an all-bond strategy? Try our BlackRock Target Income portfolio or our Goldman Sachs Tax-Smart Bond portfolio to target higher yields while taking on less risk than stocks. INVEST WITH TECH THAT OPTIMIZES FOR YOU - Rebalance your portfolio and reinvest dividends automatically - Limit your tax impact with automated tools like tax-loss harvesting and tax coordination between accounts - Set up recurring deposits on your preferred schedule - Questions? You can browse our expert resources or ask our financial advisors! KEEP MORE OF YOUR MONEY - Invest with us for just $4/month, or pay an annual fee of 0.25% on your investing account balance when you: - Have a total Betterment balance of $20,000 or more across investing and cash accounts you hold at Betterment, or - Set up a recurring deposit(s) of $250/month or more into any account - Upgrade to Premium for unlimited access to advisors at just .65% of your invested assets, a fraction of the cost compared with traditional advisors - These are CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER® professionals, salaried never commissioned, for a significantly lower management fee TURN LIFE GOALS INTO MONEY GOALS - Manage money for everyday spending and get cash back with Checking - Save for that exercise bike, your next vacation, and more - Go beyond your 401(k) with an IRA - Use our projection tools to create a plan - Calculate how to reach your target with our goal forecaster SEE THE BIGGER PICTURE - Get our all-in-one financial dashboard - Connect outside accounts, see your net worth, and view your investment performance, all in one place

apps.title: Qapital: The Money Saving App
apps.description: Save money, invest, and budget automatically with Qapital – an app that makes financial decision-making easier on the brain. Studying behavioral economics taught us that humans are simply not wired to process tradeoffs between spending now and saving for later. So, we put together a team of product experts and finance pros to build automated money management solutions that are simple to use and easy to stick with. Try Qapital free for 30 days, then $6/month. ***** Qapital helps you to put away a little bit every week. It’s the easiest way to save for things like: presents, birthdays, vacations, and emergency funds. 1. Set unlimited money saving goals Set as many goals as you’d like, personalize them, move money to them automatically, and track your progress as you go. 2. Budget with smart rules Qapital transfers money from your checking account to Qapital savings using the rules you set. We help you build rules around habits you already have. That way, you can save when you buy a treat, or go for a run. 3. Save money & invest in ETFs Automatically set money aside for savings and investing goals when you get paid, when you shop, or whenever works best for you. 4. Spend smarter Set money aside for weekly spending with the Qapital Visa® debit card. Shop anywhere Visa® is accepted, get cash from ATMs world-wide, and get notified when you’re close to your weekly budget. 5. Invite a partner and team up on your goals Qapital Dream Team™ lets you save toward shared goals and see one another’s transactions without giving up your individual accounts. You decide what’s shared and what’s private, always. ***** Qapital is a fintech company, not an FDIC-insured bank. Checking account provided by Lincoln Savings Bank, Member FDIC. Visa® debit card issued by Lincoln Savings Bank, Member FDIC. Deposit insurance covers the failure of an insured bank. Advisory services provided by Qapital Invest, LLC, an SEC-registered investment advisor. Brokerage services provided to Qapital Invest clients by either (i) Apex Clearing Corporation, an SEC-registered broker-dealer and member FINRA/SIPC or (ii) Wedbush Securities Inc., an SEC-registered broker-dealer and member FINRA/SIPC. Qapital will deduct a monthly membership fee after any applicable free trial ends and you connect a bank account. Current membership fees can be found at https://www.qapital.com/pricing. For full details, see Qapital’s Terms and Conditions (https://www.qapital.com/terms/) and Privacy Policy (https://www.qapital.com/terms/privacy-policy/).

apps.title: Alinea: Personalized Investing
apps.description: Invest with confidence using Alinea, where investment experts construct portfolios tailored to your goals and AI Allie powers insights that helps you understand and optimize your investments. Track performance, visualize growth, and make informed decisions. Key Features: - Expert Portfolios: Built by professional investment managers. - AI-Powered Insights: Instantly understand portfolio performance and opportunities. - Investing Playlists: Share and discover curated strategies. - Daily Briefing: Personalized financial news summaries. - Potential Tracker: See how your investments could grow over time. SAFE AND SECURE: At Alinea, your security and privacy are our top priorities. We use bank-level security, SSL, and 256-bit encryption to protect your information. Bank accounts are linked via Plaid, trusted by Venmo, Chime, Robinhood, Acorns, and more. Investing accounts are powered by DriveWealth (member of SIPC). Your account is SIPC insured up to $500,000 and protected by bank-grade encryption & authentication. For details, see www.sipc.org. This does not protect against a loss in the market value of securities. Must be 18+ to open an account. Alinea Invest is available only to US citizens, permanent residents, and select visa types. DISCLAIMER: Alinea Invest is an SEC registered investment adviser that offers digital and human investment advice to US residents. Alinea’s investment advisory services are available only to residents of the United States in jurisdictions where Alinea is registered. Nothing on this website should be considered an offer, solicitation of an offer, or advice to buy or sell securities. Past performance is no guarantee of future results. Any historical returns, expected returns [or probability projections] are hypothetical in nature and may not reflect actual future performance. Account holdings are for illustrative purposes only and are not investment recommendations. Registration with the SEC does not imply a certain level of skill or training.

apps.title: Oportun: Finances made simple
apps.description: Best savings app in 2024, as rated by Forbes Advisor and Bankrate. Save it or borrow it—money’s simpler with us. Download our finance app to start saving and managing your money today. Never money alone. LET’S PUT YOUR SAVINGS ON AUTOPILOT Reach your savings goals big or small. Set & SaveTM is tailored to you—your spending habits, your income, and your schedule. When it makes sense, we’ll automatically move money into your savings to meet goals that you set. Little by little and day by day, it adds up faster than you think. Our members save over $1,800 per year on average*. > Set your goals We’ve helped people save over $10.4 billion toward 15 million goals, from concert tickets to a well-earned vacation and even a first home. Tell us your goals and we’ll move your money into savings toward each one. Or, get started with a rainy day fund for the what-ifs in life. > Save at your pace We’ll learn the right times to save money, and we aim to do it in a way you won’t notice. We look at when your bills are due, when you get paid, and other ins and outs of your bank account. You can also set guardrails on the frequency and maximum amounts of money we can set aside. Let’s make your savings personalized. > Your money, your rules You can pause saves with the push of a button. Move your money back into your bank account whenever you want it. Save a lot or a little. You’ll set limits and give us guidance on how to save for you. It’s your money and you’re the boss. > How it works 1. Get set up in minutes: Link your bank account to our savings app and set your savings goals 2. We’ll get to know you: We learn your spending and income to find smart times you can afford to save 3. Effortlessly save toward your goals: We’ll automatically move money from your connected bank account and into the savings app >Take the 30 day challenge See how much you can save with a 30 day free trial of our money saving app. After that, enjoy effortless savings for just $5/month. Cancel your subscription anytime. LOAN MEMBERS, WE’RE HERE FOR YOU Are you an Oportun member with a personal loan? Let’s manage it in the app. Check your balance, make payments, set up autopay, and check the status of your loan at any time. The Oportun app is free for members to use for the purpose of monitoring and paying their loan. Looking to apply for a loan? Please visit Oportun.com or call (866) 488-6090 for money borrowing. TRUSTED AND SECURE - Your savings funds are FDIC insured.** - Oportun is certified by the US Treasury Department as a CDFI - Oportun has an A+ rating by the Better Business Bureau (BBB) Formerly known as Digit, our finance app helps you save without thinking about it, budget smarter, and managing your loan simpler. - - - - - - - Oportun offers personal loans in certain states through its partner Pathward ®, N.A., and they are subject to credit approval. Standard data charges may apply when downloading the app. * Based on average saves of all paying app members in the prior 12 months. Not a guarantee; results will vary based on your income and spending. ** Oportun is not a bank and has no direct FDIC insurance coverage for your deposits. However, Oportun holds your deposits in a FDIC insured account at Wells Fargo Bank and other FDIC insured financial depository institutions. Your cash savings through Oportun are FDIC-insured up to $250,000. FDIC insurance is only available upon the failure of Wells Fargo Bank or other depository institutions. Oportun does not share information between its affiliates or partners without consumer consent or as otherwise allowed by law. See Oportun’s privacy policy at Oportun.com/privacy.
